section_title: Where to Eat Near the Showgrounds
section_overview: Curated dining options close to the venue, organized by time of day. Practical picks for competitive riders and families who need quick, reliable meals between classes.
section_cta_text: Plan your meals around your ride times—choose dining that works with your show schedule.
section_spotlight: Highlight one or two trusted dining spots with equestrian relevance, rider-friendly hours, or proximity to the venue.
section_meta_description: Find curated restaurants near the showgrounds, organized by time of day. Quick breakfasts, easy lunches, post-class dinners, and late-night rider hangouts.
section_open_graph_description: Curated dining options for competitive equestrians: coffee stops, lunches between classes, family dinners, and late-night meetups.
section_search_description: Discover curated dining near the venue, organized into breakfast, lunch, dinner, and late-night options tailored for equestrians.

lunch.name: Example Deli
lunch.notes: Casual, fast service—ideal for quick lunches between classes.

dinner.name: Example Italian Kitchen
dinner.notes: Family-friendly dinners, big portions for post-ring appetites.

dinner_after.name: Example Steakhouse
dinner_after.notes: Late dinners for owners, sponsors, and riders after evening classes.

late_night.name: Example Pub
late_night.notes: Rider hangout for late-night bites and socializing.
